name: Lights out (itch) (jaybaus)
description:
Arrow keys - move/interact

A small bitsy game in which a power cut shuts down all electricity and devices.

The player must light all the candles in the house, however in doing so they come across various neglected items throughout the rooms that stimulate their senses and encourage them to appreciate the beauty of what's around them.

Created for the "Candles" Bitsy Jam.
